products.title: Advanced Hud System
products.description: Modern aesthetics, extensive player customization options, and top-tier optimization - these are the essentials your server needs to stand out in the FiveM community. Our latest HUD script is a perfect blend of style, functionality, and performance, designed to enhance the gaming experience for both ESX and QBCore servers.
products.fullDescription: Modern aesthetics, extensive player customization options, and top-tier optimization - these are the essentials your server needs to stand out in the FiveM community. Our latest HUD script is a perfect blend of style, functionality, and performance, designed to enhance the gaming experience for both ESX and QBCore servers.
products.installation:
1. Download and extract  
2. Add to resources folder 
3. ensure resource in server.cfg
 4. Copy `qb-core/17mov_functions.lua` file from `installation` folder. 
5. Paste copied file to root directory of your `qb-core` resource. 
6. Open `qb-core/fxmanifest.lua` and add this line at bottom of manifest file  `client_script `17mov_functions.lua` ` 
7. Restart your server

products.title: Banking Hud System
products.fullDescription: This is an Modern advance modern banking hud system which let player experience more.
products.installation:
1. Download and extract  
2. Add to resources folder 
3. ensure resource in server.cfg
4. Import the SQL file to create the required database tables
5. Configure the script in `config.lua`
